# PictoryAvis Content Guidelines

> PictoryAvis publishes French and English guides, comparisons, and product reviews about the Pictory AI video platform. Content focuses on fast production, ease for beginners, and marketing good practices.

Content should help solo entrepreneurs and small teams adopt AI-assisted video creation workflows built around Pictory.

Version: 1.0

## Languages
- French (fr)
- English (en)

## Audience
- Content creators
- Marketing teams
- Infopreneurs

## Editorial Guidelines
- Use a pragmatic, instructional tone tailored to solo entrepreneurs and small teams.
- Emphasize how AI video tools accelerate scripting, editing, and repurposing workloads.
- Reference official Pictory resources or credible benchmarks when citing performance or pricing.
- Clarify affiliate partnerships and avoid unrealistic performance promises.
